Fibonacci Endless

//Init
0 11 0 00 0000 0 00000
1 00 0 00 0000 0 00001
0 11 0 01 0000 0 00001
0 01 0 01 0000 0 00001

//Loop Start
0 10 0 01 0000 0 00000
0 01 0 11 0000 0 00000
0 10 0 10 0000 0 11111
0 01 1 11 0000 0 00000
0 10 0 10 0000 0 00010
0 11 0 01 0000 0 00000
0 01 0 10 0000 0 00000

//Jmp to Loop Start
1 00 0 00 0000 0 00100
0 00 0 00 0000 1 00000
